title: Ireland at the United Nations
subtitle:
#OnThisDay Ireland was the 27th signatory to sign the Protocol Relating to the Status of Refugees in 1968. Now, there are 146 parties signed on!

As the number of those in need increases,  reaffirms our support for the multilateral framework for protection of refugees. pic.twitter.com/ppAw8S38Q7
